archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop Party Relationship Success Business Plan
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Create an initial engagement plan which includes rules of engagement, initial plans for training, and describes the on-boarding process in more detail.

properties.value: Develop Party Relationship Success Business Plan creates an initial engagement plan which includes rules of engagement, initial plans for training, describes on-boarding processes in more detail such as profile, demographic. For partners it further describes party or enterprise product offering on-boarding and agrees to marketing activities. It also defines how an enterprise and a party will both measure success.
